title: How to Make Easy Monster Cookies

steps.headline: In a large bowl, mix the cookie dough pouches, eggs, oatmeal, and butter.
Using the potato masher, blend them thoroughly.
While blending everything, add in the Adams peanut butter.
steps.description: Add enough the consistency is appropriate.

steps.headline: Add the chocolate candies.
steps.description: You can use any type that you want. There are dark chocolate, milk chocolate, etc.

steps.headline: On a large cookie sheet, scoop out large spoons of cookie dough (the monster cookie part).
steps.description: The amount should be about 1/4 of a cup. Be sure they are about 3 inches/7.5cm apart. Alternatively, you can spread it out and make a 'cookie cake'.

steps.headline: Cook for 13 minutes.
steps.description: Now, check to make sure they are done. If done, remove from the oven to cool.

steps.headline: Enjoy your monster cookies!
steps.description: If you are making a 'cookie cake', it will need to cook a little longer.

text: Preparing the Cookie Dough In a large bowl, mix the cookie dough pouches, eggs, oatmeal, and butter.  Using the potato masher, blend them thoroughly.  While blending everything, add in the Adams peanut butter. Add enough the consistency is appropriate. Add the chocolate candies. You can use any type that you want. There are dark chocolate, milk chocolate, etc. On a large cookie sheet, scoop out large spoons of cookie dough (the monster cookie part). The amount should be about 1/4 of a cup. Be sure they are about 3 inches/7.5cm apart. Alternatively, you can spread it out and make a 'cookie cake'. Baking the Cookies Cook for 13 minutes. Now, check to make sure they are done. If done, remove from the oven to cool. Enjoy your monster cookies! If you are making a 'cookie cake', it will need to cook a little longer.
